title: Ping Spikes
body: Why am I having ping spikes like once in a while. My ping is at 63 which is normal then,, suddenly it jumps to 100- 150. My router is fine and has good connection.

replies.body: Sudden lag spikes can be due to a network issue like packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's happening in these games.  The results will also offer some troubleshooting steps specific to your lag problem.  That should get you fixed and back in game!

Hello, anything new in your Computer/Home/ISP/Building? Did it start since Windows 10 Anniversary Update?
Have a look there:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sU6DFUgBE4g
